messages.subject: spending time, was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] old timers
messages.msgSnippet: yes, I have these thoughts, but it does not stop me from packing them off to Granny s for a few hours, though I wonder whether the peace is worth the aggro of
messages.messageBody:
yes, I have these thoughts, but it does not stop me from packing them off to Granny's for a few hours, though I wonder whether the peace is worth the aggro of attitude clash...
 
I know it will improve as they grow, but silly me wants more kids!!!  ah, well, it'll be educational, I suppose :-)
 
Tracy
 
From: "libbygirl" <libbygirl@...>

Hi Tracy,
I too worried about "spending that much time with my children" but two
things helped to clarify my views : a) if I don't want to spend time with my
children, why not? Are they not the kind of people I enjoy being with and if
not, can I help them become that type of person? and b) If I, who love them
so desperately do not want to spend time with them, who the hell else
will???


Regards,
Michelle
